thread.section_title: Car Hire Labs Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Car Hire Labs | www.carhirelabs.com
thread.title: Peter
thread.title_full: Car Hire Labs bewertet von Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text: Booked in advance for a cost of £7.50 on what was considered 'a good deal'. Downloaded all paperwork from DVLA as requested and had two forms of identity. Drove the 35 miles to pickup the booked vehicle only to be informed that I required two official documents with my address on it but my driving licence would not count. Paid £3.50 for my address to be confirmed by Car Hire labs. Next I was told my 'deal' was only third party insurance and if I wanted fully comprehensive it would be triple what the car hire was. When saying no thank you., I was told that my access would therefore be £1300 which had to be blocked on my card up front. At this point I declined the rental leaving without my much needed hire, £10 out of pocket and wasting 2 hours of my time.
